pageContext.Title: Further Exploration - The future of Design
pageContext.Description: The student should do research to try and find out what are some topics that will be commonplace in a few years in the world of web design but that are still not. One or a few topics must be chosen.

Knowledge.Knowledge: Understand the evolving nature of web design

Skills.Skill: Be able to draw a picture of what the future could look like in web design

Deliver.Title: Technical Article
Deliver.Description:
Group arrangement

This work must be done individually.

 

Minimum requirements

  • A research report must be created and published

 

Deliverables

  • Link to research results article
  • Sharing session

guides.Title: Further Exploration - The future of Design

Skills.Skill: Be able to draw a picture of what the future could look like in web design

Knowledge.Knowledge: Understand the evolving nature of web design

guides.Title: Further Exploration - The future of Development

Skills.Skill: Be able to draw a picture of what the future could look like in web development

Knowledge.Knowledge: Understand the evolving nature of web development
